mapper.select: SELECT ROOM_SQ FROM ROOM_TB WHERE ACCOM_NO = #{accomNo} GROUP BY ROOM_SQ
mapper.update: UPDATE ROOM_TB SET ROOM_NAME = #{roomName}, ROOM_PRICE = #{roomPrice}, ROOM_CHK_IN = #{roomChkIn}, ROOM_CHK_OUT = #{roomChkOut}, ROOM_STD_PPL = #{roomStdPpl}, ROOM_MAX_PPL = #{roomMaxPpl}, ROOM_CNT = #{roomCnt} WHERE ACCOM_NO = #{accomNo} AND ROOM_SQ = #{roomSq}

mapper.select: SELECT R.ROOM_SQ, R.ROOM_CNT - NVL(SUB.CNT, 0) FROM ROOM_TB R LEFT JOIN ( SELECT RES.ROOM_NO, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM RESERVATION_TB RES WHERE RES.CK_RES_ST IN ('UNPAID', 'COMPLETED', 'PROCESSING') AND TO_DATE(#{checkInDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') < TO_DATE(RES.CHECK_OUT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{checkOutDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') > TO_DATE(RES.CHECK_IN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') GROUP BY RES.ROOM_NO ) SUB ON R.ROOM_SQ = SUB.ROOM_NO WHERE R.ACCOM_NO = #{accomNo}
